abstract.text: Parameters that affect the process of training a model.

abstract.text: Create machine learning models for use in your app.
A classifier that predicts the target by creating rules to split the data.
Parameters that affect the process of training a model.
Values for specifying validation data.
A text representation of the model parameters for a decision tree classifier thatâ€™s suitable for output during
debugging.
A text representation of the model parameters for a decision tree classifier.
Creates a new set of parameters.
The maximum depth of the tree. Must be greater than 0.
The minimum weight of each leaf node.
The minimum amount that the loss needs to be reduced to create a new
split.
A description of the model parameters for a decision tree classifier shown in a playground.
The seed value for random operations during tree building process.
Validation data.
The data used for the validation set to inform the model training process.
The names of the columns you selected at initialization to train the classifier.
Creates a decision tree classifier classifier  from a checkpoint.
Creates a decision tree classifier.
Creates a Decision Tree Classifier from the feature columns in the training data to predict the categories in
the target column.
Creates or restores a training session.
Creates or restores a training session.
The underlying parameters used when training the model.
Restores an existing training session.
Resumes a training session from the last checkpoint if available.
The name of the column you selected at initialization to define which categories the classifier predicts.
Trains a decision tree classifier.
Trains a decision tree classifier.
A type with a customized textual representation.
A type with a customized textual representation suitable for debugging purposes.
A type that supplies a custom description for playground logging.
A type whose values can be implicitly or explicitly copied.
